sections.description: Adds Airbnb-style wishlist functionality and site-wide enquiry system for Products. Create multiple wishlists, save products, manage quantities, and send enquiries.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to /wp-content/plugins/
2. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress
3. Follow the README.md for Bricks Builder integration
sections.changelog:
= 2.1 =
* Test update release
* Minor improvements

= 2.0 =
* Added: Complete enquiry system with quantity controls
* Added: Send wishlist to enquiry functionality
* Added: Auto-save quantity changes
* Added: Real-time count badge updates
* Added: 8 new AJAX endpoints for enquiry management
* Added: Bricks query loop for enquiry items
* Added: 3 new dynamic data tags
* Added: Comprehensive documentation (README.md, QUICK-REFERENCE.md)
* Added: CSS styling for all enquiry components
* Updated: Plugin now supports both wishlists and enquiries

= 1.2 =
* Initial wishlist functionality
* Create, rename, delete wishlists
* Add/remove products from wishlists
* Bricks Builder integration

= 1.0 =
* Initial release
